text: "Busy (For Me)" is the second single from Portuguese singer Aurea and serves as the second single from her self-titled debut album Aurea after "Okay Alright". The single was released on May 21, 2010 for digital download. It spent a total of 44 weeks on the Portuguese singles chart, two of which were at number one. The accompanying music video had more than 2.2 million views on YouTube as of January 2013.
title: Busy (For Me)
